application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 & T.2 Pine - Reduce more heavily leaning tree by 30% of crown material, reduce less severely leaning Pine by 15% of crown material.T.3 Pine - Remove large lateral stem growing towards Birch tree for safety reasons.G.3 Coppice Cluster of Holly Trees to enhance space beneath Pine,T.4 Sweet Chestnut - Reduce crown overhang over multi-sports court by 3m and crown lift to 7m.
